document.heading: Redevelopment Land Agency Disposition Review Amendment Act of 2000

history.narrative: Law 13-226, the “Redevelopment Land Agency Disposition Review Amendment Act of 2000”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-185, which was referred to the Committee Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 11, 2000, and November 8, 2000, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 29, 2000, it was assigned Act No. 13-498 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-226 became effective on April 3, 2001.
